GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.AwardXP: Включает распределение пунктов опыта между игроками после боя за победу над врагами
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.EnhancedConditions: Позволяет привязывать состояния к иконкам статуса токена
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.HideNames: Заменяет настоящее имя актёра на выбранное
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.PanSelect: Наводит камеру на токен в его ход
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.TemporaryCombatants: Позволяет создавать временных участников боя для отслеживания состояния окружения и неодушевлённых объектов
GADGET_DESCRIPTIONS.Triggler: Система триггеров при изменении состояний и параметров актёра/токена
APPS.Wiki.Title: Combat Utility Belt Wiki
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.MapMismatch: This map does not match your game system and may not work as expected.

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Title: Лаборатория состояний
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ActiveEffects.Ti: Настройки активных эффектов (Выключено - Сначала сохраните раскладку)
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ConfirmDeleteCon: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить этот ряд?
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.RestoreDefaultsC:
Are you sure you want to restore this mapping to defaults?

If you save, this change will be permanent.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.ResetFormContent:
Are you sure you want to reset the form?

You will lose any unsaved changes.
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.SaveFailed: Condition Lab failed to Save and Close
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.Title: Options:
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.RemoveOt: Remove other conditions when this one is applied
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.MarkDefe: Mark matching combatants defeated when this condition is applied
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.Options.OutputCh: Output this condition to chat when added/removed
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.PreventativeSaveRemi: CUB - Enhanced Conditions | Preventative Save Reminder

To prevent some issues arising from the migration to Active Effects, please open the Condition Lab and click the Save Mapping button if you haven't already done so since CUB v1.3.0.

This will ensure your Condition Map is converted correctly.
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.EnableHint: Скрывает имя этого актёров в чате и боевом режиме (приоритет выше глобальной настройки)
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.ReplacementHint: Это имя будет отображаться вместо настоящего
HIDE_NAMES.ActorForm.DefaultSettingH: Это глобальная настройка по умолчанию для актёров с данным отношение
SETTINGS.Concentrator.EnableH: (Только D&D5e)(Требуются Улучшенные состояния) Forces concentration checks on tokens with the concentrating status effect when they take damage
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConditionNameH: Name of the Condition to use for adding and checking for Concentration
SETTINGS.Concentrator.OutputToChatH: Display a message in chat whenever concentration is threatened
SETTINGS.Concentrator.PromptRollH: Prompt the player to make the check or not
SETTINGS.Concentrator.ConcentrationAttri: Concentration Attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.HealthAttributeH: Health/HP attribute name as defined by game system
SETTINGS.Concentrator.AutoConcentrateH: When a Concentration spell is cast, automatically set the Concentrating status
SETTINGS.Concentrator.NotifyDoubleH: Send a message when a Concentration spell is cast while another spell is being Concentrated on
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.CoreIconsH: A copy of the core status icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SystemH: A reference to the game system. Defaults to other if not known to the module
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.OutputCombat: On each round of Combat, output any conditions for the current combatant to chat
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.DefaultMapsH: Module-provided maps of conditions to icons
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.RemoveDefaul: Remove existing status effect icons from token HUD
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.MapTypeH: Condition map type currently in use -- default, custom or other
SETTINGS.EnhancedConditions.SuppressPrev: Suppress the reminder to save the Condition Lab to prevent issues (eg. if user has already done so)
SETTINGS.GiveXP.EnableH: Включает распределение пунктов опыта между игроками после боя за победу над врагами
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableH: Скрывает имена актёров в чате и боевом режиме
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableHostileH: Скрывает имена актёров, чьё отношение выставлено как ВРАЖДЕБНОЕ
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableNeutralH: Скрывает имена актёров, чьё отношение выставлено как НЕЙТРАЛЬНЫЕ
SETTINGS.HideNames.EnableFriendlyH: Скрывает имена актёров, чьё отношение выставлено как ДРУЖЕСТВЕННОЕ
SETTINGS.HideNames.HostileReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Hostile Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.NeutralReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Neutral Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.FriendlyReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Friendly Actor names
SETTINGS.HideNames.ReplacementStringH: Text to display for hidden names
SETTINGS.HideNames.HideFooterH: When names are hidden, also hide the chat card footer which can contain sensitive information
SETTINGS.HideNames.HidePartsH: If a hidden name includes spaces, breaks it into parts and hides all the parts
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.EnableH: (Только D&D5e) Automatically check to see if token owner of NEUTRAL actor also owns an actor with the Mighty Summoner feat. Automatically calculates and adds new HP formula and rolls HP for token on canvas drop
SETTINGS.MightySummoner.FeatNameH: Name of the feat to check for
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnablePanH: Enables the following token panning functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanGMH: Pans GM. Options: None (do not pan GM), NPC (pan only to non-player character tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.PanPlayersH: Pans players. Options: None (do not pan players), Owner (pan only to Owned tokens), Observer (pan to Observed AND Owned tokens), All (pan to all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.EnableSelectH: Enables the following token select functionality
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectGMH: Selects token based on selected option: None (do not select), NPC (select only non-player character tokens), All (select all tokens)
SETTINGS.PanSelect.SelectPlayersH: Selects Player-owned tokens on their turn in combat
SETTINGS.PanSelect.ObserverDeselectH: Deselect controlled tokens on any non-Owned combatant's turn
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.EnableH: Reroll initiative for each combatant every round
SETTINGS.RerollInitiative.RerollTempComb: Set whether to reroll initiative for Temporary Combatants if they are enabled
SETTINGS.TemporaryCombatants.EnableH: Allows the creation of temporary/freeform combatants from the Combat Tracker
SETTINGS.ActorUtility.InitiativeFromShee: Creates a clickable link on the Initiative heading in some Actor sheets
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.AutoRollHostileHpN: Enable Auto Roll Hostile Token HP
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.AutoRollHostileHpH: Automatically roll hp for hostile tokens on canvas drop
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.HideAutoRollH: If Hostile Token HP is automatically rolled, hide the roll from players
SETTINGS.TokenUtility.TokenEffectSizeH: Sets the size for token effect icons on the token. Numbers represent the amount of effect icons to show (X * Y). Default: Small - 5x5
